Class cGalaxy

java.lang.Object
Data.cObjectBase
Data.cGalaxy
public class cGalaxy extends cObjectBase
Represents a galaxy containing stars in the StarViewer application. This class extends cObjectBase to inherit naming functionality and manages a collection of stars within the galaxy. It supports various galaxy types according to the Hubble classification system.

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    cGalaxy.eGalaxyType
    Enumeration of galaxy types based on the Hubble classification system.

  • Constructor Details

    • cGalaxy

      public cGalaxy(String name, cGalaxy.eGalaxyType type)
      Constructs a galaxy with the specified name and type. Uses the standby logger as the default logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the galaxy
      type - the classification type of the galaxy

    • cGalaxy

      public cGalaxy(String name)
      Constructs a galaxy with the specified name and default type (SBc). Uses the standby logger as the default logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the galaxy

    • cGalaxy

      public cGalaxy(String name, cLoggingBase logger)
      Constructs a galaxy with the specified name, default type (SBc), and logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the galaxy
      logger - the logger to use for this galaxy

    • cGalaxy

      public cGalaxy(String name, cGalaxy.eGalaxyType type, cLoggingBase logger)
      Constructs a galaxy with the specified name, type, and logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the galaxy
      type - the classification type of the galaxy
      logger - the logger to use for this galaxy

  • Method Details

    • ClearStars

      public void ClearStars()
      Clears all stars from the galaxy. Also clears all planets from each star before removing them.

    • AddStar

      public void AddStar(cStar star) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Appends a star to the end of the galaxy's star list. If the star is already in the galaxy, a warning is logged but no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      star - the star to add to the galaxy
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the star is null

    • AddStar

      public void AddStar(cStar star, int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException, IllegalArgumentException
      Inserts a star at a specific index in the galaxy's star list. If the star is already in the galaxy, a warning is logged but no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      star - the star to add to the galaxy
      index - the index at which to insert the star
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds
      IllegalArgumentException - if the star is null

    • RemoveStar

      public void RemoveStar(cStar star) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes a star from the galaxy by reference. If the star is not in the galaxy, a warning is logged but no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      star - the star to remove from the galaxy
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the star is null

    • RemoveStar

      public void RemoveStar(int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Removes a star from the galaxy by index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the star to remove
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds

    • GetStar

      public cStar GetStar(int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Gets a reference to a star at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the star to retrieve
      Returns:
      the star at the specified index
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds

      public int GetStarCount()
      Gets the number of stars in the galaxy.
      Returns:
      the count of stars in this galaxy

      Sets the classification type of the galaxy.
      Parameters:
      type - the new galaxy type to set

    • ToString

      public String ToString(boolean recursive)
      Returns a string representation of the galaxy with optional recursive details.
      Parameters:
      recursive - if true, includes detailed information about all contained stars
      Returns:
      a string representation showing the galaxy name, type, star count, and optionally detailed star information

    • ToString

      public String ToString()
      Returns a string representation of the galaxy without recursive details.
      Overrides:
      ToString in class cObjectBase
      Returns:
      a basic string representation of the galaxy

    • GetRandomGalaxyType

      public static cGalaxy.eGalaxyType GetRandomGalaxyType(Random rand)
      Gets a random galaxy type using the provided random number generator. This is a static utility method that can be used without creating a galaxy instance.
      Parameters:
      rand - the random number generator to use
      Returns:
      a randomly selected galaxy type

    • GetRandomGalaxyType

      public static cGalaxy.eGalaxyType GetRandomGalaxyType()
      Gets a random galaxy type using a new random number generator. This is a static utility method that can be used without creating a galaxy instance.
      Returns:
      a randomly selected galaxy type
